title: Cycles Manivelle La Grande Banane Handlebar and Shoulder Bag
content:
Cycles Manivelle, French framebuilders, just unveiled an all-new bag design from its shop, the La Grande Banane (175,00€ – 190,50€). This bag attaches securely to the handlebars and can be worn as a shoulder/cross-body bag or a large hip bag…

La Grande Banane is made from 500gr/m2 heavy-duty tarpaulin, waterproof (PFAS-free) roll top and lining fabrics, and a padded 3D mesh back. Most of the materials are leftovers or deadstock. All clips and zips are YKK.

The main volume is approximately 5 liters. It is reinforced with foam to protect the contents and structure the bag’s shape, even when empty. Inside, you’ll find three different pockets for sorting contents. With its waterproof zip and easy access, the front pocket is where you’ll find your phone, wallet, or tissue hanky.

La Grande Banane is handmade in Strasbourg by the superb team of Libre Objet.

Specs:

  • 175,00€ – 190,50€
  • Big fanny pack (5- 7.5 L range)
  • Convertible to a handlebar bag
  • Designed to be a bikepacking bag and an everyday bag. Should work with a stylish outfit as much as with a dirty cycling jersey
  • Durable materials and water-resistant construction. YKK components. 490g
  • Many pockets
  • Handmade in France by Libre Objet (social workshop based in our town) from mostly upcycled materials and deadstocks
  • All information on the product page

Available now in the Cycles Manivelle webshopor at dealers.
